name: Hack or Die!
description:
THE HACKY-SACK PLATFORMER

Save your best friend Kevin from the evil Block Head! Unique enemy mechanics and huge bosses stand in your way. Keep the ball air-born while you kick your way through sprawling levels. Expanding hacky-sacks primary concept: keep the ball up with your arsenal of crazy kicks... or DIE!

UNIQUE KICKING MECHANICS

KICK JUMP RUN = Simple controls with huge depth. Intuitive button combinations lead to amazing stunts and tricks. Flip, Slide, Charge-up and explore the insane depth of controls.

ANYONE CAN HACK IT

DONT WORRY. Beginners can learn to kick at their own pace with instant re-spawns and lots of checkpoints. Accessibility options allows players to play their way. Anyone can kick and KICKING STUFF IS FUN!

DESIGNED FOR SPEED-RUNNERS

SKILLS. Veteran players can showcase their skills with amazing acrobatics and blazing fast kicks. Use your speed-multiplying bicycle flip-kick to build momentum and long jump to fly across stages.

MOVEMENT TECH

WHAT SKILL CIELING? so many kicks, so many tricks. Hack or Die! has insane depth if you seek it. No hacky-sack is ever out of reach if you have the skill! I have yet to see players master the entire move set. Heck, with countless hours of play testing I personally am still improving! Experiment, you might find new ways to STUNT!

ALL PROCEEDS GO TO REAL LIFE KEVIN THE DOG'S KNEE SURGERY! THANK YOU!

"WOOF!" - Kevin the dog
